transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Good morning, ma'am. I'm Ankita speaking from IndiaMART.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Uh, ma'am, IndiaMART has received a complaint from you. Uh, you are facing some issues with the services related to buyleads.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Uh, ma'am, in this regard, your discussion with account manager Naman sir took place. So, are you satisfied with the solution?
Customer: No, I am not satisfied with the solution. I told him yesterday too.
Executive: Uh, actually, as you have mentioned that relevant leads are coming less to you and as your category is also a high demand category. So, will you tell me, ma'am, overall, like, what issue are you actually facing? I am seeing boring bars, your face milling cutters, in this you are consuming leads continuously and leads are also coming quite high.
Customer: Jo relevant aa rahe hai na wo, unko phone kiya toh wo irrelevant bol rahe hai.
Executive: Irrelevant in terms of what, ma'am? I am just asking, is the location wrong? Quantity you are not getting correct?
Customer: Tools galat hai, wo bol rahe hai.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hai?
Customer: Tools galat hai, requirement galat hai.
Executive: Aapne ye jo recent buyleads consume ki hai, on that basis agar mai discuss karu, so aapki kuch buyer se baat hui hogi, like consume ki hai last one-two days me ya one week me. Toh waha pe overall kya follow up raha buyer ke saath aapka?
Customer: Ek do jo relevant aa rahe hai, wo toh bol rahe hai ki humko requirement nahi hai, khatam ho jati hai wo, ek ghante me khatam kaise ho jati hai, aadhe ghante me. Aur dusri taraf bolte hai ki aur kuch aur bolte hai ki nahi, ye hamari requirement nahi hai, alag hai requirement, ye ye cutter nahi hame lagte, dusre type ke lagte hai. Irrelevant ho jate hai wo.
Executive: Ma'am, obviously, kya aap jo buyleads consume kar rahe hai, waha pe aap pehle sare specification wagera check karti hongi ki kya mention hai?
Customer: Sab barabar hai wo, jab lead consume karte hai sab barabar likhte hai wo, phone karte ho toh alag bolte hai wo.
Executive: Thik hai. Ma'am, jaise aaj aapne ek buylead consume ki hai Nitesh ji ki Coimbatore se face closing tool holder. Unse baat ki aapne?
Customer: Unhone uthaya nahi phone.
Executive: Uh, dusre ek Rahul ji the Mumbai se ek steel aapne lead consume ki thi.
Customer: Unhone bhi phone nahi uthaya.
Executive: Siddharth the Bhiwandi se clamping tools ke regarding.
Customer: Wo galat bole, unhone bole ki nahi, nahi chahiye humko.
Executive: Uh, ma'am, jaise agar mai is lead ki baat karu, toh buyer ne apna email ID, mobile number, company, sara kuch verify karaya hai. Toh kahi na kahi ma'am requirement toh rahi hogi, tabhi toh IndiaMART pe requirement dali hai unhone. Maybe aisa ho sakta hai ki.
Customer: Kitne baje dala tha, kya 3 baje dala tha, maine 3:15 baje call kiya toh bolte hai nahi humko requirement.
Executive: Okay. Ma'am, jin buyer ne aapka phone nahi receive kiya, jaise ki matlab aap dekh rahe ho call nahi pick kiya, toh unko aap matlab kitne der baad dobara call karti hai?
Customer: Roz kar rahi hu mai.
Executive: Accha, agar mai kisi buyer ne phone nahi receive kiya, toh aap dobara usko connect karte hai ya ya lead manager se koi message wagera drop karti hai ki aapka requirement aaya tha, maine aapko connect karne ki.
Customer: Whatsapp bhi kar rahe hai.
Executive: Ha.
Executive: Okay. Ma'am, jaise mai dekh pa rahi hu ki aap buyleads toh sare fresh hi consume kar rahe hai. Toh aap accept kijiye ki irrelevant aa rahe hai. Aap mujhse argue mat kijiye, accept kijiye ki ha irrelevant aa rahe hai. Mai kya pagal nahi baithi hu yaha pe mai batane ko.
Customer: Argument wali baat nahi hai, mai aap se isliye puch rahi hu ki jo lead aapne consume ki hai, pichle do se teen dino ki agar mai baat karu, toh wo lead aapne within four hours hi consume ki hai aur jo lead aapne consume ki hai uske mobile number, email ID sab kuch verify hai.
Customer: Agar ma'am verify hai toh. Naya lead aaya hai, ye dekhiye, naya lead aaya hai, cone raster laser cleaning machine, ye hamara hai hi nahi toh mujhe kyu dikh raha hai ye?
Executive: Toh agar ma'am wo lead aapke liye nahi hai toh mai uska solution de rahi hu. Pehla toh aap isko not relevant mark kijiye.
Customer: Saaram ne bataya mujhe wo non delete kar dijiye wo lead. Ye roz karte baithu kya mai, aath din se wahi kar rahi hu.
Executive: Nahi, iske alawa bhi ek option hai ma'am, iske alawa bhi ek option hai, mai aapko batati hu. Abhi aapne desktop pe login kar rakha hai ya mobile app pe?
Customer: Phone pe.
Executive: Phone pe. Aap latest buyleads ke option pe jaiye.
Customer: Usme hi dikh raha hai mujhe, cone rust laser.
Executive: Just a minute ma'am, mai ek new step aapko guide kar rahi hu. Aap latest buyleads pe click toh kijiye na.
Customer: Kijiye, le liya, latest buylead, ha.
Executive: Ha. Latest buyleads pe jab aapne click kiya, toh page pe sabse upar teen bindu ban ke aa rahi hogi right hand corner pe.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Teen line ya teen bindu ban ke aa rahi hai?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Uspe aap click kijiye, usme ek option aayega buyleads preferences ka.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Buyleads preferences me kuch green marks honge, kuch red marks honge. Toh green marks me jo aapke leads hai, jiske liye aapko IndiaMART lead suggest kar raha hai, wo hai boring bar, CNC cutting tool holder. Is tarike se che se saat category hai ya more than six to seven. Kya ye sare aapke liye relevant hai? Aap ek baar check karke batayengi?
Customer: Carbide tool nahi hai relevant.
Executive: Carbon tool relevant nahi hai, thik hai. Toh niche ek option aa raha hoga search category to exclude buyleads. Waha pe aap carbon tool carbide tools hai, carbon tool nahi, carbide tools enter karke usko exclude kijiye.
Customer: Ek right karne ka option aa raha hoga usme carbide tools.
Executive: Kar diya aapne? Iske alawa aur koi lead?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Uh, mai aapko batana chahungi ma'am, ye jo option humne diya hai, maan lijiye koi bhi XYZ category ki aapko lead continuously aa rahi hai, wo remove nahi ho rahi hai panel pe aur aap delete bhi mark kar rahe ho. Toh yaha agar wo enter karke aap remove kijiye ga, toh aapko us category ki lead aani band ho jayegi. Ye ek option maine aapko bataya hai jisko aap utilize kar sakte hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Iske alawa ma'am, iske upar hi page pe ek location preferences ka bhi option aa raha hoga ki jis jis location se aap lead consume karte hai, wo location dikh rahi hai. Somehow agar koi location aisa hai jaha pe aap lead nahi karna chah rahe hai, toh wo location bhi aap remove kar sakte hai.
Customer: Location ka problem nahi hai mujhe.
Executive: Location ka problem nahi hai. Category category preferences ke upar aap dekhiye location preferences ka bhi option hoga.
Customer: Ha na, iska problem nahi hai bola na, location ka problem nahi hai.
Executive: Accha, location ka problem nahi hai, okay, okay. Alright. Uh, ma'am, isme aapke relevancy ke liye mai ek cheez aur aap se puchna chah rahi thi. Jaise aapka jo catalog hai, catalog me sari cheeze jo bhi aapke design ki gayi thi, uh, renewal ke pehle catalog aapne dobara design karaya tha, mapping wagera bhi karai thi. Jisme aapka ek hai indexable end mill.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Toh indexable end mill aur indexable face mill cutter, toh isme kya differences hai, batayenge thoda?
Customer: Dono alag alag tool hai.
Executive: Aap kisko deal kar rahe hai? Indexable end mill me ya indexable face mill cutters me?
Customer: Dono me hai.
Executive: Dono me deal kar rahe hai. Ek aur category ke bare me bataiye aap, ball nose cutter aur special helical milling cutter, ye dono ek hai ya different hai?
Customer: Dono me hai.
Executive: Ha. Dono deal kar rahe hai?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Thik hai, thik hai. Other than that ma'am, aapki sari mapping bilkul sahi hai, mapping in the sense ki aapka product jo same se added hai, same name se humne category pe dal rakha hai. Pricing wagera ki details bhi aapne kafi behtar dal rakhi hai. Yaha pe ek cheez hai ma'am ki agar aapke paas koi lead bar bar continuously not relevant aa rahi hai, toh aapko exclude karna padega jo maine abhi aapko option bataya. Aur jo bhi lead aap consume kar rahe hai ma'am, try kijiye ki us pe ek reminder set kijiye lead manager se aur usko 4 ghante ke baad dobara connect kijiye. Kyunki ma'am aapka jo product hai wo kahi na kahi high sale demanded product hai. Usme jitna aap connect kar rahe hai utna hi aapka competition bhi hai. Competitive market me agar aap continuously buyer ko follow karenge, toh obviously wo conversion me aapko help karega.
Customer: Nahi, abhi tak toh ek bhi convert nahi hua hamara. Do mahine se chal raha hai, ek bhi nahi hua aur mai toh constant rehti hu IndiaMART pe, ye toh aap boliye mat aur turant mai open kar leti hu, turant call bhi kar leti hu. Messages bhi chalu hai, constant chalu hai.
Executive: Obviously ki aap matlab lead toh consume kar rahe hai ma'am, lekin kahi na kahi matlab agar aap isko thoda sa aur high kar sakte hai. Jaise aap pichle month me aapne 22 days aapka dikh raha hai ki aapne 22 days buylead consume kiye hai. Ye agar 28 ya 29 days agar aap karte hai, toh kya hoga ki aapka panel aur zyada active dikhega, somehow aapko call and enquiry bhi zyada better milegi. Aapke paas enquiry ka count bhi aa raha hai ma'am, enquiry pe bhi aapko follow up lena chahiye. Jaise enquiry jitna zyada aap reply karenge direct messages pe, direct pe enquiry pe, utna aapka enquiry dheere dheere increase hota hai.
Customer: Aapka problem kya hai pata hai kya ki aap argue kar rahe ho mujhse ki like ye karo wo karo wo sab kar rahi hu mai bata rahi hu aapko. Saaram se bhi wahi mai bol rahi hu, wahi solution bol rahe ho aur wo puchte baad me end me aapka pata hai mujhe job kya hai, aapko sirf wo close karna hai ye ki ha customer is satisfied, aapka bas yahi solution hai bas.
Executive: Nahi nahi ma'am, agar close karne wali baat hoti ma'am, toh maine abhi aapko category preference ka option bataya ki aap usko exclude kar sakte ho. Kyunki dekhiye ma'am, aap jo bhi feedback apna apne seller panel ko dete ho, on that basis feedback hi AI work karta hai. Aap jaise waha pe exclude karenge, AI waise lead aapko dena band kar dega. Aisa nahi hai ma'am, agar aapka complaint aaye hue teen din ho gaye, hum log yahi try kar rahe hai na ki aapko ek end resolution de, tabhi hum aapka concern close kare. Aisa nahi hai ki close karne wali baat hai ma'am.
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai ma'am, aap kuch aaj ek do lead. Ma'am, aap ek do din lead aaj consume kijiye aur ek baar aap buyleads ke latest buyleads pe batayenge ma'am, abhi aapke paas kuch leads available hai latest buyleads pe jo aapke kaam ki ho.
Customer: Phone rust laser cleaning machine ye nahi hai, ye kaha se aaya mujhe lead, kyu aaya aur?
Executive: Kaun sa aap bata rahe hai?
Customer: First jo lead aaya hai, cone rust laser cleaning machine.
Executive: Latest buyleads me kyu aaya hai?
Customer: Isko aapne not relevant mark kiya hai na ma'am?
Customer: Nahi kiya hai maine, abhi aapko dikhane ke liye maine rakha hai, kyu kiya, kyu aaya mujhe?
Executive: Not relevant mark kar dijiye ma'am aur exclude bhi kar dijiye jo maine aapko bataya na us category ko exclude kar dijiye. Jo option maine aapko bataya category preference ka waha se.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Iske alawa ma'am, koi leads jo aapke liye irrelevant ho, aap India ka filter apply karke dekhiye. Jaise aap India ka filter apply kijiye.
Customer: Aap kijiye call fir se.
Executive: Thik hai ma'am, okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Expresses frustration with the lack of conversions.

- Feels executives are only focused on closing complaints.



Resolution:

- Executive guided on excluding irrelevant categories.

- Executive explained how to utilize lead preferences.

- Executive advised setting reminders and following up.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try the suggested steps.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, irrelevant leads, category preferences, exclusion
